about_the_game:
Wand Out Guide is a spoiler document with all choices you need to make to unlock all NSFW content available in the game and as a consequence get ALL the endings.

This DLC contains a pdf document FULL OF SPOILERS about Wand Out.

To access the document, you need to go to:

Location:
C:\Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\Wand Out - A 3D Magical Gay Novel\Wand Out - Guide.pdf

content_descriptors.notes: This DLC contains spoilers for an adult game but no explicit scenes are available in it.
